law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"American steel product" means a product that is:
produced from steel made in any state by the open hearth, basic oxygen, electric furnace, Bessemer, or other steel making process; and
rolled, forged, drawn, cast, extruded, or otherwise similarly processed.

"Public body" means:
the State;
a unit of the State government; or
a county, municipal corporation, school or conservation district, or other governmental entity that, by State law, awards contracts for public construction or other public work.
